extensionDescription.message: An assistant tool for exhentai.org, providing multiple reading modes, grid view, and keyboard support.

maxHistoryCount.description: Label for max history entries input.

fitToWindow.description: Label for fit to window checkbox.

hidePreviewBar.description: Label for hide preview bar checkbox.

openOptionsButton.description: Button to open the options page.

saveSettingsSuccessLang.message: ✅ Language saved! Please reopen to apply.

saveSettingsError.description: Error message when saving settings fails.

clearCacheDescription.message: If you encounter image loading issues or display errors, you can try manually clearing all cached data. This will clear all preloaded images and page indexes.
clearCacheDescription.description: Description for the clear cache button.

historyEmpty.description: Message shown when history is empty.

bookmarksEmpty.description: Message shown when bookmarks are empty.

optionsSubtitle.message: Click a button then press a key to change the hotkey

contextMenuSaveTag.description: Context menu option to save a tag.

checkingLoginStatus.description: Text shown while checking login status.

loggedInStatus.description: Status when the user is logged in.

loggedOutStatus.message: You don't seem to be logged in.
loggedOutStatus.description: Status when the user is not logged in.

loginButton.description: Button to go to the login page.

loginStatusError.message: Could not check login status. Please check extension permissions.
loginStatusError.description: Error message for login status check failure.

toggleSavedTags.description: Link to toggle the saved tags bar on search pages.

importPlaceholder.message: Paste the exported i18n JSON content here...
importPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the import textarea.

importSubmitButton.description: Text for the confirm import button.

importSuccessAddOnly.description: Success message when only adding tags.

importSuccessUpdateOnly.description: Success message when only updating tags.

importErrorInvalidJson.description: Error message when JSON format is invalid.

importErrorNoData.message: ❌ Import failed! No valid data found to import.
importErrorNoData.description: Error message when no valid data is found.

importErrorNoAction.message: ℹ️ No action needed. All imported tags match existing data.
importErrorNoAction.description: Message when no changes were made.

searchTagsPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the tag search input.

tagsIoTitle.description: The title for the tags import/export page.

exportDescription.message: Click the button below to generate data for all your saved bookmarks. You can back this up or import it on another device.

generateExportButton.description: Button to generate the export data.

copyToClipboardButton.description: Button to copy data to the clipboard.

copySuccess.description: Success message after copying to clipboard.

importDescription.message: Paste the previously exported JSON data into the field below and click 'Import'. This will add new bookmarks and update existing ones.

manageTagsIoButton.description: Button to open the import/export page for tags.

confirmClearHistoryTitle.description: Confirmation modal title for clearing history.

confirmClearHistoryMessage.message: Are you sure you want to clear all browsing history? This action cannot be undone.
confirmClearHistoryMessage.description: Confirmation modal message for clearing history.

confirmClearBookmarksTitle.description: Confirmation modal title for clearing all bookmarks.

confirmClearBookmarksMessage.message: Are you sure you want to clear all saved tags? This action cannot be undone.
confirmClearBookmarksMessage.description: Confirmation modal message for clearing all bookmarks.

keyExitWithShortcut.description: Tooltip for the back-to-gallery button in the reader, showing the shortcut key.
